slide.title: Theory: Callbacks
slide.blurb: The user-defined signal handlers are called ~callbacks~.
The low-level event callbacks receive an additional parameter object describing the event. It has fields for event type, button number if it was a mouse click, key code if it was a key press, etc.

It is possible to connect more than one callback to the same signal. They will be run in the order they are connected. It is also possible to simulate emission of a signal by the widget, for some custom purposes.
